mapper.select: SELECT fp.team_id AS teamId, CASE WHEN fpb.id IS NOT NULL THEN true ELSE false END AS hasSubmitted FROM finale_project fp LEFT JOIN finale_project_board fpb ON fp.team_id = fpb.team_id AND DATE(fpb.created_at) = #{targetDate} AND fpb.is_deleted = false

SELECT ftm.user_id AS userId, u.name AS userName, ftm.role AS memberRole FROM finale_team_member ftm JOIN user u ON ftm.user_id = u.id JOIN finale_project fp ON ftm.finale_team_id = fp.team_id WHERE ftm.finale_team_id = #{teamId} AND fp.is_deleted = false ORDER BY CASE ftm.role WHEN 'leader' THEN 1 WHEN 'member' THEN 2 END
